definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: palace, temple (As. loan-word; BH; also Palm. [[היכלא]] and [[הכלא]] Lzb:259 SAC:43);—emph. [[הֵיכְלָא]] Ezr 4:14 +; cstr. [[הֵיכַל]] Da 4:26; sf. [[הֵיכְּ לִי]] Da 4:1, [[לֵהּ]]- Da 6:19;—
place of king Da 4:1, Da 4:26, Da 5:5, Da 6:19, Ezr 4:14 (v. [[מְלַח]]).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in Jerusalem Da 5:2, Da 5:3, Ezr 5:14 a, Ezr 5:15, Ezr 6:5, Ezr 6:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in Babylon Ezr 5:14 b, Ezr 5:14 c.
